class src.typelens.nlls

Nonlinear Lens Structure (plano-convex lens) parameters.

version: int = -1
medium: nlms
rc0: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]
wavelength_design: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]
__post_init__()
property focal_length: float

rc0 / (n0 - 1)

Type:

Optical focal length

property rc: float

Radius of curvature (m)

property design_wavelength: float

Design wavelength (m)

property nz: int

Number of steps

property dz: float

Step size in propagation direction

property length: float

Total lens length (m)

property n0: float

Index of refraction at center

property k2: float

Dispersion parameter

property n2i: float

Intensity-dependent nonlinear index

property beta: float

Two-photon absorption coefficient

property alpha: float

Linear absorption coefficient

property material: str

Material name

property wavelength: float

Operating wavelength (m)

property medium_data: nlms

Underlying medium data
